description:
Even when you do keep the open side up, in big water a canoe can flood pretty fast. Help keep it buoyant with these heavy-duty end bags.

  • Heavy polyurethane coated nylon is resistant to abrasion and UV
  • Large dump valve allows quick inflation and deflation
  • Three-dimensional design provides maximum space filling and flotation
  • Sized to fit most popular whitewater solo canoes
  • Dimensions for Short size are 107 x 102 x 61cm (length, width, depth) or 42 x 40 x 24in. Long is 145 x 97 x 61cm or 57 x 38 x 24in
  • Sold singly
name: NRS Canoe 3D Solo Flotation Bag
